name: PLAN 302 D100
prerequisites: PLAN 100 or PLAN 200; one of PLAN 300 or PLAN 319, or REM 319; and permission of department. Student must be enrolled in the bachelor of environment in resource and environmental management planning stream.

name: PLAN 402 D100
prerequisites: PLAN 302 and permission of department. Student must be enrolled in the bachelor of environment in resource and environmental management planning stream.

name: PLAN 404 D100
prerequisites: PLAN 100 or PLAN 200; REM 207 or any INDG course; and 75 units. Recommended: REM 319 or PLAN 319.
